column2: Drain and rinse the canned or thawed frozen artichoke hearts, then roughly chop them.'
In a mixing bowl, combine cream cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise, minced garlic, grated Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper.'
'Fold in the chopped artichoke hearts until well combined.'
'Transfer the mixture to a baking dish.'
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the dip is bubbly and golden brown on top.'
'Remove from oven and let cool slightly before serving.'
Serve warm with crackers, bread, or vegetables for dipping.'
